comments.body: I read Lautaroâ€™s statements in a website today where he said he is focusing on deep play and letting Thurman be more in the penalty area. But I feel Lauti is one of the best in the penalty area and comes more naturally to him.

comments.author: blasphemics
comments.body:
Halfway through the match Bastoni and Bisseck will have switched sides so many times that a small gust of wind will have formed around them. And then they'd have faster and faster swaps back and forth between them making the little wisp of air soon after turn into a strong wind and then a fucking tornado that runs amok through Como for us to win 11:0.

That's my prediction.
